entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Swan River

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
